name: Afternoon Program
description: The afternoon program is for children 3 and up. The day begins at 12:30pm with lunch together and afterward the children choose from various indoor and outdoor experiences. After clean up time the day continues with singing games, creative movement, and time to discuss the day's activities. The day ends at 3:30pm with snack and a story.
